overview:
Robert E. Levin, emerging markets, global macro strategist, mobile technology leader, author, inventor 

Robert Levin is also CEO of Transclick, Inc., a Technology Pioneer member of the World Economic Forum with over 5 million clients in 192 countries. Transclick has recently won 3 awards: The OnMobile 100, the AlwaysOn Global 250 and the Gold Edison Award 2012. He is a Tech Laureate of the Tech Museum of Innovation and he is a co-founder of Appeo.

He is also a Managing Director of Emerging Star Capital, LLC which advises family offices, private banks and institutional investors. He is an inventor, best-selling author, public speaker and holds one issued US patent. He is also a strategist in global macro, emerging markets and technology investments. He was trained at Salomon Brothers and was a top strategist for 2 hedge funds, Tudor and Moore Global.

Robert Levin is a foreign policy analyst and recognized expert in technology and global emerging markets. He is a member of the World Economic Forum and was an active corporate member of the Council on Foreign Relations. He is the author of  the first biography of President Bill Clinton, Bill Clinton: The Inside Story, and Democratic Blueprints: National Leaders Chart America’s Future.    He was an Adjunct Professor of Finance at the Columbia Business School teaching global investment strategy and an Adjunct Assistant Professor of Political Economy at Columbia University.    Contact:  robert.e.levin@gmail.com  or 1-212-751-5150 Ext. 5  and mobile Ext. 1
